title: Last Period: Owarinaki Rasen no Monogatari
title_english: Last Period: The Journey to the End of the Despair
title_japanese: ラストピリオド -終わりなき螺旋の物語-
synopsis: "Period" is how magic users called who beat "Spiral"—monsters that were summoned from isolation. Due to the rise of these beings, 14-year-old apprentice Period Haru, who is a part of the Eighth Arc-end Division, is called to break the cycle and cast himself into the endless battle. However, a mysterious thievery occurred and sank the division into bankruptcy, forcing Haru and his other comrades have to leave their headquarters. To rebuild a branch, they have to overcome quest after quest. (Source: MAL News)
opening_themes: "Yokubari Dreamer (欲張り Dreamer)" by Haru (Natsuki Hanae) x Choco (Yukari Tamura)
ending_themes: "Wiseman no Theme (ワイズマンのテーマ)" by Wiseman (Mizaru (Sayaka Harada), Kikazaru (Akari Kito), and Iwazaru (Ayumi Mano))
